ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hi...I am looking for a EQ entusiast (addict) for a TV Interview
ygData.msgSnippet: I come out of lurking to say this: TechTV is a really great network that I watch constantly. I am sure that whatever package they are producing will be fair
ygData.messageBody:
I come out of lurking to say this:
TechTV is a really great network that I watch constantly. I am sure
that whatever package they are producing will be fair and informative
to both players and non-players of Everquest. Call for help is, as you
might guess from the title, is a call-in show where the host help
people out with their computer questions. I hardly think they will be
grilling interview-ees about EQ suicides or any other hot button
issues. They may mention the addictive nature of EQ, but I doubt it
will turn into any sort of an inquisition. TechTv has always been cool
about covering computer games and the culture of computer gamers. Heck,
they are sponsoring their own LAN party of Unreal Tournament 2003.

Ashley Dusenbery
Designer
ashley@...
(901) 383-1200
